name: Duha Menaimon
ability: After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system.

name: Quetzecoatl
ability: Other players cannot use SPACE CANNON against your ships in this system.

name: Arc Secundus
ability: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD. At the start of each space combat round, repair this ship .

name: Son of Ragh
ability: None

name: Artemiris
ability: Other players must spend 2 influence to activate the system that contains this ship

name: The Inferno
ability: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 cruiser in this unit's system.

name: Wrath of Kenara
ability: After you roll a die during space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

name: Dynamo
ability: After any player's unit in this system or an adjacent system uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may spend 2 influence to repair that unit.

name: Genesis
ability: At the end of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

name: Hil Colish
ability: This ship's system contains a delta wormhole. During movement, this ship may move before or after your other ships.
During a space combat, hits produced by this ship and by your dreadnoughts in this system must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

name: Arvicon Rex
ability: During combat against an opponent whose command token is not in your fleet pool, apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls.

name: Fourth Moon
ability: Other players' ships in this system cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

name: Matriarch
ability: During an invasion in this system, you may commit fighters to planets as if they were ground forces. When combat ends, return those units to the space area.

name: Visz el Vir
ability: Your mechs in this system roll 1 additional die during combat

name: The Alistor
ability: At the start of a space combat, choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in that combat as if they were ships.

name: Memoria I
ability: You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

name: Memoria II
ability: Tech Requirement BGY. You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

name: C’Morran N’orr
ability: Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ship's combat rolls in this system.

name: Ouranos
ability: DEPLOY: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your PDS, you may replace 1 of those PDS with this unit.

name: J.N.S. Hylarim
ability: When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of a 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 2 additional hits.

name: The Terror Between
ability: Capture all other non-structure units that are destroyed in this unit's system, including your own.

name: Salai Sai Corian
ability: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls a number of dice equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

name: Loncarra Ssodu
ability: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

name: Van Huge
ability: When this ship is destroyed, destroy all ships in this system.

name: Y’sia Y’ssrila
ability: This ship can move through systems that contain other player's ships.
